Package org.xeustechnologies.jcl

Class Summary
AbstractClassLoader Abstract class loader that can load classes from different resources
ClasspathResources Class that builds a local classpath by loading resources from different files/paths
CompositeProxyClassLoader CompositeProxyClassLoader implement a composite of delegate class loader.
Configuration General configuration using System properties
DelegateProxyClassLoader DelegateProxyClassLoader implements a ProxyClassLoader which delegate loading to a specific AbstractClassLoader loader instance..
JarClassLoader Reads the class bytes from jar files and other resources using ClasspathResources
JarResources JarResources reads jar files and loads the class content/bytes in a HashMap
JclObjectFactory A factory class that loads classes from specified JarClassLoader and tries to instantiate their objects
JclUtils This class has some important utility methods commonly required when using JCL
ProxyClassLoader  
 

Enum Summary
ResourceType Enumeration for different resource types
